title: Earning BE
body: I can't seem to earn any BE. I used to be able to earn about 100-200 IP for winning a game, but now I cant earn any BE from winning. I can earn it however by selling some of my loot. Please help!

replies.body: IP is a thing of the past now, so you won't be getting IP after completing matches like you used to. You still earn BE the usual way by disenchanting shards and getting some as drops from chests/capsules.
its going to take so much longer to earn champions and be able to buy loot

I will be interested in the price of things the loot drops. Because as I checked I need quite a lot games even for lvl 30-31 level up, and I dont earn anything with my playing hours, and I get random stuff
this is the only way now to get be
